{marketData.map((item) => (
{item.name}
{item.shares} C·ªï ph·∫ßn
‚¨Ü {item.up} ({item.upCount}) üü® {item.unchanged} ‚¨á {item.down} ({item.downCount})

{item.status}
))}
); } export default MarketSummary;
